content:
ItemsChangedEventHandler Delegate

Definition

Represents the method that will handle the ItemsChanged event.

In this Article

public delegate void ItemsChangedEventHandler(object sender, ItemsChangedEventArgs e);
Inheritance
Object
Delegate
ItemsChangedEventHandler
